post:
Couple of revitalised offers, with a spec bump (including current customers read at the bottom for more info)

**LET "CB" KVM**

- 1GB DDR4 Guaranteed Ram  
- 1GB Swap  
- 1 Shared CPU Core  
- 120GB Disk Space (Originally 60GB)  
- 6TB Bandwidth  
- 1 IPv4 
- KVM Technology
- SolusVM  
- ISO Repository  

~$23/ Year  
~$46/ Biennially

[Order](https://billing.zxhost.co.uk/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=37) -- Telehouse Frankfurt - /64 IPv6  
[Order](https://billing.zxhost.co.uk/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=36) -- OVH CA  
[Order](https://billing.zxhost.co.uk/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=35) -- OVH GRA  

**LET SSD KVM**

- 1GB DDR4 Guaranteed Ram  
- 1GB Swap  
- 2 Shared CPU Core E5 2660 V3  
- 80GB SSD Raid 10 HW Raid BBU  (Originally 40GB)
- 2TB Tier 1 Bandwidth  
- 2Gbps Hypervisor Uplink
- KVM Technology  
- SolusVM  
- ISO Repository  
- 2 x IPV4
- /64 IPv6

~$43/ Year  
~$6/ Monthly  

[Order](https://billing.zxhost.co.uk/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=20) -- Telehouse Frankfurt - /64 IPv6


[Terms & Conditions](http://zxplay.co.uk/terms.html)  
[Frankfurt Looking Glass](http://bandwidth.zxhost.co.uk/)

**Current customers will just need to reboot their VM from SolusVM, and expand the file-system from within their OS. If you require any help please open a Support Ticket**
